Home » 14S5 Mahāvaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 12 Saccasaṃyutta » 12.11 Pañcagatipeyyālavagga
12.11.2 Manussacutitiracchānasutta
Saccasaṃyutta
Pañcagatipeyyālavagga
Manussacutitiracchānasutta
1173.
2523…  “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti; atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye manussā cutā tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti…pe… .
2524Dutiyaṃ.
